text: Gustav Schwarzenegger (17 August 1907 – 13 December 1972) was an Austrian police chief, postal inspector and a military police officer. He was the father of Hollywood star and former Governor of California, Arnold Schwarzenegger. Gustav Schwarzenegger was born in Austria-Hungary, the son of Cecelia (née Hinterleitner, 1878 – 1968) and Karl Schwarzenegger (1872 – 1927). He was a sportsman and loved music. Gustav Schwarzenegger was a member of the Sturmabteilung (SA), also known as the Nazi stormtroopers, and the Nazi Party. Schwarzenegger died of a stroke in Weiz, Steiermark, Austria on 13 December 1972 at the age of 65. == References == == Other websites == * "Records: Arnold's father was member of Nazi storm troops", AP wire services via USA Today 8/24/2003 Category:1907 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Austrian people of World War II Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:SS officers Category:Police officers Category:Sturmabteilung people Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Gustav Schwarzenegger
